name: Composition Groove
description:
You don’t have to stay inside the lines to do a little boogie.

Signature Early VideoFeeling by Sarah Zucker / @thesarahshow. Created in studio in 2017 with digital animation, Hi8 camcorder feedback and analog processing on VHS. Filmed in 4k from vintage CRT TV screen. Remastered in 2021.

Special Gift Edition for collectors of the “Back 2 School” Series, which was made a diptych after the “discontinuation” of the original hicetnunc in November 2021. Gifted to holders of both editions of the diptych, not for sale on primary.

Limited edition of 10.
